data.oai_dc:dc: This file, which is in standard SAM format, contains the genomic position of each of the mapped markers. The ID for each locus is the ID allocated to each marker by the program Stacks 1.3.5. The sequence in the SEQ field is the consensus tag sequence for each marker, exported from Stacks 1.3.5. Mapping was performed with bowtie 2.2.6.
